title: Kadhal Vennila Song Lyrics Vaanathaippola
stanzas:
Kadhal vennila
kayyil serumaa
sollu poongaatre
nee sollu poongaatre

imaiyaaga naanum iruppen
imaikkaamal paarthu rasippen
pala jenmam naan eduppen
unakkaaga kaathiruppen

Kadhal vennila
kayyil serumaa
sollu poongaatre
nee sollu poongaatre

Vaanathu nilavaai nee irundhaal
unaku badhil naan theindhiduven
theepathai pole nee irundhaal
unakku pathil naan urugiduven

poovanam pole nee irundhaal
poovukku badhil
naan udhirndhiduven
sollu poongaatre
nee sollu poongaatre

Kadhal vennila
kayyil serumaa
sollu poongaatre
nee sollu poongaatre

Oaviyam pol unni varaindhidave
udhiram kondu niram eduppen
silai ena unnai sedhukkidave
imaigal ennum uzhi eduppen

kavidhaiyai pol unai ezhudhidave
uyirukkul irundhu sol eduppen
sollu poongaatre
nee sollu poongaatre

Kadhal vennila
kayyil serumaa
sollu poongaatre
nee sollu poongaatre

imaiyaaga naanum iruppen
imaikkaamal paarthu rasippen
pala jenmam naan eduppen
unakkaaga kaathiruppen

Kadhal vennila
kayyil serumaa
sollu poongaatre
nee sollu poongaatre
